strIntroduction: Explore all the main attractions of Berlin on a half-day guided bike tour. Explore the city’s unique history, from the Prussian Empire, to the days of the Third Reich, the city split by the Berlin Wall, and reunification after the fall of the wall.

Discover the enchanting beauty of Heidelberg and the modern vibe of Frankfurt on this comprehensive tour of both cities. Plus, not only will you be taken to the most interesting sites in these two unparalleled cities.
strTitle: Heidelberg and Frankfurt City Tour（Start from Frankfurt）

strIntroduction: Berlin has been at the epicentre of most world-shaping events of the past century, which has resulted in today’s wonderfully diverse city with a rich display of historical and cultural sights, buildings and memorials alluding to its chequered heritage. The double-decker, hop on-hop off Berlin Tourist Bus offers three ways to explore the German capital and discover its many sights and attractions while learning about its dramatic past. Take the Classic Tour or the Wall and Lifestyle Tour, or a tour that combines both.
Munich has a rich heritage as the city of beer, breweries, beer gardens and beer festivals

Our ticket including Hop on - hop off bus tour and an one hour boat tour in Hamburg
strTitle: Hop on - hop off bus and boat tour

strIntroduction: "St. Pauli,TuttifFrutti" is our most popular tour of land gang St. Pauli.

Discover Stuttgart on a city rally with a smart electric vehicle from car2go. Solve the exciting tasks in a team and collect points along the way. On this 3-hour tour, explore the city, the picturesque Neckar river, and the vineyards.
strTitle: Stuttgart: 3-Hour City Rally by Smart Car from car2go

strIntroduction: Take a day to explore the impressive natural bounty along the German Alpine Road, coupled with a bit of history, as you take in a few sites used by the Third Reich at the height of World War II. Offering a bit of past and present, you're sure to have a day to remember.

Skip the long lines for taxis, or the hassle of navigating public transport upon arrival at either Berlin’s Tegel or Schönefeld Airport, and enjoy a private, chauffeur driven transfer to your city hotel in a stylish, comfortable, and luxurious vehicle.
strTitle: Tegel or Schönefeld Airport Transfers to Berlin Hotels

strIntroduction: Germany, Baden-Baden is a chic destination for those who fancy a dip in its famous thermal hot springs.

Our Grand Circle Tour shows you additional to the highlights of Munich the Palace of Nymphenburg, the Olympic Grounds as well as the Siegestor near the English Garden on our open air double-decker buses.
Use this Sim Card with high-speed networks and unlimited data during your stay in Germany!

Enjoy hassle-free travel from Frankfurt city center to Frankfurt Airport on this 1-hour Frankfurt Airport private departure transfer. Hop into your private vehicle at the designated time at your hotel or other pickup point in Frankfurt. Then, relax in air-conditioned comfort on route to the airport. Avoid potential problems on public transport and arrive feeling relaxed and ready for your flight. Transfer services are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Discover Mannheim on a 2-hour guided Segway tour. The tour will take you along the Rhein and show you all that the city has to offer! Ride by the noble Lindenhof area, through the magical Waldpark, and much more.
strTitle: Segway Tour of Mannheim: Rhein, Waldpark, and Lindenhof

strIntroduction: 一張德鐵通票（German Rail Pass FLEXI ）讓你在德國自助旅行暢通無阻。30 天內任選 3 天無限制搭乘 DB 運營的 IC、EC、ICE Sprinter、ICE 火車，甚至還能到鄰近國家玩。德鐵通票絕對是你遊覽德國最便利且必備的工具！

Many people consider St. Pauli to be the most sinful district of Hamburg because of the many bars, sex shops and “love against money”, but it is much more than that! St. Pauli is a party mile, a waterfront and also a residential area with a very interesting history. On our guided tour you will get to know a lot about Hamburg’s previous suburbs, the former borders between Hamburg and the Danish town of Altona.
strTitle: st pauli red light district walking tour

strIntroduction: Our Discover Berlin tour is a perfect introduction to Berlin and covers ALL the main sights worth seeing over 3.5 to 4 hours.

Discover the beers of Bamberg on this entertaining tour with a visit to an original brewery. See Bamberg Cathedral and Neue Residenz castle, hear all about the purity laws and beer witches and sample Bamberg's best beers.
strTitle: Bamberg: Private Brewery and Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Explore the variety of Frankfurt, from the Coronation City of the German Emperors to the modern European Banking Centre, is one of the most breath-taking cities in Germany!
strTitle: Frankfurt City Hop on Hop off Tour

strIntroduction: Soak up the magic of the season with a tour of the dazzling Munich Christmas markets. Munich doesn’t skip on the Christmas cheer! With more than 20 holiday markets across the city, you’ll enjoy a focused, family-friendly tour of the best including Christkindlmarkt in Marienplatz. Shop for unique Bavarian gifts, sip on glühwein (mulled wine) and nibble on spiced cake as you wander the iconic markets in Munich Old Town.

strTitle: Europe Pocket Wi-Fi: Picking Up in HK Airport

strIntroduction: Cologne Rhine Pass allows you to hop on and off along Middle Rhine, just check the timetable, make up your travel plan and enjoy the picturesque river view.
strTitle: KD RhinePass - One Day Hop On - Hop Off

strIntroduction: Take to the water and explore Dresden and its verdant surroundings by boat. On a two and a half hour cruise you’ll be able to absorb the city’s magical panorama from a different point of view, as well as the leafy landscapes of the Elbe River Valley.
strTitle: Dresden by Boat along the River Elbe

strIntroduction: Experience Munich by night, visit the Hofbräuhaus for dinner, and enjoy views from the Olympic Tower
Discover the palaces, lakes and gardens of the former royal city of city of Potsdam with this relaxing and informative bike tour.
strTitle: Palaces and Gardens of Potsdam Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Experience the old-world charm of Germany's romantic Heidelberg and the Rhine river, as you spend a day touring this delightful combination of rich history and natural beauty.
strTitle: Explore Heidelberg and the Rhine Valley

strIntroduction: Unravel a distinctive past and uncover a unique character today on this tour of Hidden Berlin that takes you to some of the major sights of the city and also reveals some hidden gems. Let the professional guide lead you through places of historical and social importance, explaining the background and the real stories of the people of Berlin.
Play out your soccer fantasy and tour the Allianz Arena and training grounds of FC Bayern Munich
Experience the diversity of Frankfurt on this two hour guided tour of the city. This comprehensive trip takes you to all the most important sights of this historical and modern metropolis.

Experience an intergalactic show at the Friedrichstadt-Palast in Berlin with tickets to "THE WYLD", a story of flamboyant mavericks and city slickers that is a love declaration to Berlin. Admire over 100 dancers, musicians, artists, and soloists.

Explore Stuttgart at your own pace with a 24-hour ticket for a hop-on hop-off bus tour. Enjoy a comfortable ride in the open-top double-decker buses, discover the most important sights in the city, and get lots of information with the audio guide.
strTitle: Stuttgart 24-Hour Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Bus Tour

strIntroduction: Looking for an authentic experience in the evening? Still have questions for our guide that you didn’t get a chance to ask on the day tour? Then join us on a culinary sojourn through Neukölln, an up-and-coming neighbourhood far off the tourist track.
strTitle: Culinary Berlin – Local Food and Local Neighbourhoods

strIntroduction: Explore Bremen onboard a comfortable bus on this sighseeing tour. Discover the main attractions in the Art Nouveau district of Schwachhausen, the alternative Ostertor district, and the interesting Überseestadt neighborhood.
Discover the historical sites that were the origins of the Nazi party and the German resistance movement
strTitle: Munich Under the Third Reich and the German Resistance

strIntroduction: Create your own personal vision of Berlin. Discover the bustling German capital at your leisure.
strTitle: City circle Hop on-Hop off Tour

strIntroduction: Enjoy a trouble-free start to your time in Frankfurt on this 1-hour Frankfurt Airport private arrival transfer. Meet your driver at the prearranged time at Frankfurt Airport. Then, hop into your private air-conditioned vehicle and relax on route to your hotel or other destination within Frankfurt. Avoid problems with the public transport system and arrive at your destination relaxed and ready to enjoy your stay to the full. Transfer services are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

During this tour you will get to know the many sides of Hamburg, from both land and water. You will discover the city with a double-decker bus and the Alster and Elbe Rivers from typical Hamburg barges. You can take the tour all in 1 day or spread it out over 2 or 3 days.
strTitle: Discovery tour, Alster and Elbe cruise

strIntroduction: Enjoy hair-raising thrills and exciting adventures at one of Europe’s largest theme parks on this independent Phantasialand Theme Park day trip from Frankfurt. Delve deep into savannah plains in the Africa zone and experience gold-rush fever among the Aztecs in ancient Mexico. Test your nerve on the Black Mamba or Colorado Adventure rollercoasters, and explore the ghoulish Mystery Castle! Ride a rickshaw through Middle Kingdom and discover Chinese gardens and temples. Choose from over 50 attractions among Phantasialand’s fantasy-filled zones, with plenty of fun for kids large and small!
strTitle: Phantasialand Theme Park Independent Day Trip from Frankfurt

strIntroduction: Explore more than 110 luxuriously appointed boutiques in Ingolstadt Village on a 6-hour independent shopping trip from Munich! Travel by luxury coach and enjoy savings of up to 60 per cent on the top international brands.
Explore the streets of Berlin in a mini hot rod.
strTitle: Discover Berlin in a mini hot rod

strIntroduction: Discover Berlin in a manner you’ve never experienced before; specifically, its wonderful Friedrichshain. Far from your usual touristic walkabout, this tour gives you the opportunity to talk with locals and hear their stories; teaches you some traditional dance moves; and introduces you to some of the city’s best beers. What’s not to like?

Skip the long lines to Berlin’s TV Tower, and enjoy panoramic city views as you enjoy dinner in the “Sphere” restaurant. See iconic sights, such as the Reichstag, Brandenburg Gate and Olympic Stadium, from more than 650 feet above ground.
strTitle: Skip the Line: Dinner atop the Berlin TV Tower

strIntroduction: Discover a piece of history and admire the fascinating architecture of the Semperoper in Dresden on a 45-minute guided tour. Explore one of the most beautiful and prestigious opera houses in the world, and learn about the history of this grand building.
strTitle: Dresden: Semperoper Tickets and 45-Minute Guided Tour

strIntroduction: Join this 2-hour guided walking tour and explore Hamburg's infamous Red Light District. Learn about the historical background of the district and why the widely practiced profession in this quarter became so popular. Tour the shady and scandalous streets of city and enjoy a unique Hamburg experience.
strTitle: St. Pauli Neighborhood And Red Light District Walking Tour in Hamburg

strIntroduction: Berlin’s Jewish community can be traced back to the time of the Great Elector in the 17th Century. Despite almost complete obliteration at the hands of the Nazis there is still a Jewish community in Berlin.
strTitle: Jewish Life in Berlin – The old Jewish quarter

strIntroduction: Berlin without Potsdam is like Paris without Versailles - leave Berlin without a trip to its royal residence, and you can't say you've seen Berlin! Begin with a train ride from Berlin to Potsdam and discover this fascinating city with a walking tour.

For 40 years Hard Rock Cafe has been synonymous with action, entertainment and good food. Since the beginning Hard Rock Cafe has offered traditional, freshly prepared American food in a rock'n'roll atmosphere.
strTitle: Hard Rock Cafe Munich – skip the line

strIntroduction: The story of Berlin tour encompasses all that Berlin has to offer, from historical sights attesting to its harrowing past, to a modern vibrant culture that points to a thriving future.

See the highlights of Munich from the comfort of your open-top bus with this intriguing tour of the Bavarian capital. Full commentary is provided and since your ticket is valid for one day you have the chance to board and depart whenever you want, making it the perfect way to explore the heart of the city.
strTitle: Hop On Hop Off Express City Circle

strIntroduction: Skip the long lines for taxis and avoid the hassle of navigating public transport when you arrive at Munich International Airport. Book this service and enjoy a private, chauffeur driven transfer to your city hotel in a comfortable and luxurious vehicle.
strTitle: Private Transfer to/from Munich International Airport

strIntroduction: Walking through the Neustadt and have a wonderful afternoon with us.

Explore Munich at your own pace on a hop-on hop-off bus tour. Get on and off the double-decker bus as often as you please with your full-day ticket. See all the highlights of Bavaria’s capital city including Odeonsplatz, the Pinatheken, and Marienplatz.
strTitle: Hop on Hop off Grand Circle

strIntroduction: Explore the heart of Berlin by boat on a comprehensive cruise that takes you from west to east past the city sites.
Experience the contrasting diversity of the city of Frankfurt, where history subtly blends with modernity, and the spectacular landscape of the Rhine valley.
strTitle: Frankfurt city and Rhine Valley tour

strIntroduction: This is a private 1-way airport transfer in a 3 seat luxury sedan from Franz Josef Strauss International Airport to Munich. All year round, 24 hour, punctual, safe, and truly global. All transfers are 100% carbon offset.
strTitle: Green Path Private One Way Transfer from Munich Airport

strIntroduction: Hop aboard the Shopping Express for a luxury shopping experience at Wertheim Village.

Explore Berlin’s dark past on a guided tour of its former Nazi buildings, Soviet war memorials, and Hitler’s bunker. Learn how Hitler rose to power and turned Berlin into an extension of the Nazi machine on this Third Reich half-day walking tour.
strTitle: Berlin's Infamous Third Reich Sites Half-Day Walking Tour

strIntroduction: The Berlin Sightseeing Pass is the only pass which allows you free access to over 55 top museums and attractions around the city!
Explore a city of silver and a church of bones with this fascinating trip to the historical town of Kutná Hora.
strTitle: Kutna Hora Day Trip from Prague

strIntroduction: Visit a town that which was originally a military fortress built in 18th century by Emperor Josef II and during World War II. It served as a Jewish collection and concentration camp.
strTitle: Theresienstadt concentration camp tour from Prague

strIntroduction: Sample the best Czech beers on this three-hour tasting session in Prague. Your friendly local guide will explain the most important aspects of professional beer tasting and tell you all about the beer- brewing traditions in the Czech Republic. Your relaxing evening offers an insightful introduction into the world of beer brewing in Prague, and you’ll leave the tour an expert on pilsners, porters and everything in between!
If you love castles, you won't want to miss Cesky Krumlov's World Heritage-listed castle!
Become a local by learning the tricks only the residents of Prague know! Spot and find hidden and secret ways through Prague’s old town and hear interesting often untold stories along the way too.

See how genuine Bohemian crystal is made with this intriguing visit to the traditional Nizbor glass factory. Experience this typical and world-famous Czech product with one short trip from Prague. Come and discover one of the best glass factories in the world. Head out to central Bohemia and see how Czech top quality products are made.

Walk through a thousand years of history with this fascinating trip into Prague’s Jewish past. Few cities can boast a richer Jewish culture than beautiful Prague, which a vibrant community of Jews have made their home for a millennium. During this walking tour you will see the only Central European Jewish Quarter that survived the holocaust, and discover the triumphs and tragedies of this remarkable and resilient community.
Discover true Czech hospitality in a warm and festive folklore garden party including dinner, dancing, live music, and an open bar! Enjoy a performance of gypsy-style dancing.
strTitle: Evening Folklore Prague Garden Party with Dinner

strIntroduction: Take off on a spectacular bike journey down the amazing side streets of Prague to enjoy all the beauty and diversity this European gem has to offer.
One prepaid SIM to be used in 32 European countries (3G H internet, 4G LTE for UK exclusively)
Visit the oldest royal town in the Czech Republic by private car and guide
strTitle: The town of Olomouc, Unesco world

strIntroduction: Discover the magic of ancient Prague through stories and legends as old as the city itself. Use this exceptional occasion to visit places at night-time and join the exploration of how mysterious the heart of Europe really is. Learn about the magical side of Prague and meet its ancient ghosts.
Enjoy the most important sites in Brno in this walking tour. Learn about the history, architecture, legends, or functionalist architecture of the city.

During your visit to Prague you should find time to visit the impressive neo-Gothic Karlstejn Castle, located just outside the city. It is a building that tells many tales of battles, treasures and royal life.

Join the exciting pub crawl and experience some of the best entertainment in Prague. Relax and have a drink after a long day of sightseeing. This special tour gives you the unique opportunity to get acquainted with Prague’s nightlife while socializing with other travellers and locals. Enjoy a variety of drinks and clubs en route as well as the largest dancing stage in central Europe.

Tour central Prague in style as a passenger in a beautiful vintage car driven by a professional driver. Highlights include the Old Town Square, the Jewish Quarter and Lesser Town. What better way to see the charming and elegant city of Prague, with all its heritage and beautiful buildings, than in an equally elegant classic car? So fasten your seatbelt and get ready for the trip of a lifetime in one of these graceful and timeless vehicles.

Come and visit the magnificent castle of Konopiste. Discover the charm of one of the most beautiful chateaux in Bohemia. Enjoy a brief bus trip from Prague into the countryside of the central Bohemian region. Find out in a day trip why this was the chosen residence of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria.

Enjoy an unhurried lunch cruise that gently winds down the Vltava River. View the capital of the Czech Republic from an entirely new angle. Journey past the various historically significant sites and see Prague’s major attractions in style from a lunch cruise.

Discover Prague from every perspective on this walking, sailing and minibus tour of the beautiful Czech capital. Undoubtedly one of Europe’s most spectacular and historic cities, see all of Prague’s major attractions in one trip and learn about the city’s fascinating past from your expert guide. You will take in the Old Town, the Jewish neighbourhood, Charles Bridge, the Castle area the Vltava River and much more on this memorable tour.
strTitle: The best of Prague - on foot, by bus and by boat

strIntroduction: Visit the Moravian Karst, sail the river Punkva and climb by cable car to the Upper Bridge. A view into the depths of the Macocha abyss from the Upper or Lower bridge gives us an unforgettable experience.

Hop on and experience the best of Prague’s world-famous sights by bus. Explore stress-free and with ease the capital of the Czech Republic. See the Prague Castle, the Dancing House and pass by the Jewish Quarter on this excursion around beautiful Prague. Trace the different architectural styles throughout the city and spot Gothic statures, baroque churches or neoclassical buildings.

Text your way around Prague on this tour with a twist! All you need to do is locate a local SIM card, acquire an activation code, and then get ready to meet your friendly and informative new tour guide: your mobile phone. There’s not a moment to waste as you set to work on a high-tech treasure hunt through this beautiful old city.

You have already heard of the great reputation that Czech beer has, and now is your chance to taste it for yourself and learn why the Czech Republic makes some of the best beer in the world! The pilsens and budvar beers all over the world are not the real beer culture we’ll show you on this tour!

Travel from Brno to the nearby Blansko District to visit the Moravian Karst and the pilgrimage church in Křtiny. Take a walk through the caverns of Cave Výpustek, and learn about the top secret command post that was set up there in the 1960s.
strTitle: Cave Vypustek and the Temple of Krtiny

strIntroduction: Discover the historic buildings and haunting bone chapel of Kutna Hora, one of the most popular destinations in the Czech
strTitle: Prague Kutna Hora and Bone Chapel Tour

strIntroduction: Take a break from the busy streets of Prague to enjoy the wonderful spa town of Karlovy Vary

Renaissance ancient town of Tel?, called the Venice of Moravia, also UNESCO’s world heritage site, gives the impression of fairy-tale town. The city takes pride in having Gothic Chateau and the most picturesque town square of the country - Zacharias of Hradec Square. We will visit Tel? Chateau and the renaissance town centre.

When we talk about “The old town”, we are talking about the original historic part of Prague city. As there was near to no bombing on Prague during WWII, most of Prague’s historical centre remained undamaged.
Discover beautiful Prague, the city of a hundred spires, with this bus and boat tour that ends with a wander over the 14th century Charles Bridge.
strTitle: City tour, cruise and Charles Bridge tour

strIntroduction: Every city in the world has a bohemian district but only in Prague does Bohemian mean something much more special. The Bohemian Prague tour covers the essence of the Czech capital, from iconic landmarks to the tastes, sights and sounds of the City of a Hundred Spires. Come along and learn all about its architecture, art, culture and people during this morning tour.
Come and join a trip to the magnificent city of Dresden. Visit the capital of Saxony.
Acquaint yourself with the charms of spectacular Prague with this relaxing afternoon boat trip.
strTitle: Cruise on the Vlatava river with coffee and cake

strIntroduction: The beauty of Prague isn’t just on the outside; you’re as likely to find it inside the city’s many beer halls. This three-hour evening tour will take you to five of the best in town so you can savour some of the brews that have made Czech beer a byword for excellence.

Get a new perspective of Lisbon from on board a luxurious yacht on a 2-hour sunset cruise from Belém Tower, passing the Cristo Rei monument, Terreiro do Paço and Alfama along the way. Sail the calm waters of the Tagus River as the sun sets over the city.
strTitle: Lisbon: 2-Hour Sunset Cruise along the Tagus River

strIntroduction: Enjoy Lisbon’s best belvederes and the most charismatic Fado districts of Mouraria and Alfama. Experience the sweet taste of Lisbon’s favorite liqueur – Ginjinha – in a local Fado tavern, while walking in Mouraria.
strTitle: Lisbon Sunset Small-Group Walking Tour with Fado Performance

strIntroduction: Experience the excitement of kayaking in Arrábida Natural Park on this day tour from Lisbon. Take in beautiful landscapes, explore caves and inlets, and have a picnic on a secluded beach. Later, take a tour of the amazing Sesimbra castle.

Discover the Old Town of Lisbon, the Belém district, and incomparable sights throughout the city on this tour. Then discover the romance and charm of Sintra and wander among the fairytale palace and gardens of Pena Palace.
strTitle: Lisbon and Sintra Pena Palace Tour
